vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.48;
son of: Caleb (H3612H) and Maacah (H4601L);
brother of: Tirhanah (H8647), Shaaph (H8174H) and Sheva (H7724);
half-brother of: Hur (H2354), Jesher (H3475), Shobab (H7727H), Ardon (H0715), Mareshah@1Ch.2.42 (H4337), Haran (H2771B), Moza (H4162), Gazez (H1495), Jahdai (H3056) and Achsah (H5915H)
§ Sheber = "breaking"
a Judaite, son of Caleb by his concubine Maachah and of the family of Hezron
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (2)   descendiente de Caleb; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
示別 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "打破"
猶大希斯崙家族的迦勒和其妾瑪迦所生的兒子 #代上 2:48|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
示别 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "打破"
犹大希斯仑家族的迦勒和其妾玛迦所生的儿子 #代上 2:48|
